title: Remove Element
problem: Given an array and value, remove an element specified.
example: <Text> Given input array nums = [3,2,2,3] and val=3, Your function should return length 2 </Text>

title: Remove Duplicates
problem: Given a sorted array, remove duplicates
example: Given input array nums = [1,1,2,2,3],  Your function should return length 3
solution: We can solve by iterating only once.
